extendedIngredients.name: meat
extendedIngredients.original: 100 grams fresh prawns meat shells and veins already removed
extendedIngredients.originalString: 100 grams fresh prawns meat shells and veins already removed
extendedIngredients.originalName: fresh prawns meat shells and veins already removed

extendedIngredients.name: napa cabbage
extendedIngredients.original: 3 leaves of napa cabbage blanched in boiling water for 30 seconds
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 leaves of napa cabbage blanched in boiling water for 30 seconds
extendedIngredients.originalName: napa cabbage blanched in boiling water for 30 seconds

extendedIngredients.name: sugar
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 tsp caster or super fine sugar
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 tsp caster or super fine sugar

extendedIngredients.name: water chestnuts
extendedIngredients.original: 50 grams fresh water chestnuts peeled and roughly chopped
extendedIngredients.originalString: 50 grams fresh water chestnuts peeled and roughly chopped
extendedIngredients.originalName: fresh water chestnuts peeled and roughly chopped

extendedIngredients.name: wine
extendedIngredients.original: 1 tsp Chinese cooking wine Hua Tiao/Shao Hsing
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tsp Chinese cooking wine Hua Tiao/Shao Hsing
extendedIngredients.originalName: Chinese cooking wine Hua Tiao/Shao Hsing

title: Steamed Dumplings/Pot Stickers
instructions: Process half of the prawns in a food blender for a few seconds to get finely minced prawn meat. For the remaining half of the prawns, chop them up roughly using a knife.In a bowl, add minced prawns, minced meat, water chestnuts, garlic, spring onions and the marinade ingredients at (A). Mix well to form a paste.Place a piece of dumpling skin on the palm of your hand. Scoop 1/2 tbsp of dumpling filling onto the centre of the skin. Add a few pieces of chopped prawns. Dab your finger in water and wet the edges of the skin with your moist finger.Fold the dumpling in half to form a half-crescent shape. Starting from one end and with slightly moist fingers, pleat the edges towards the centre. Repeat with the other end. Wrap dumplings until you finish all the filling.Arrange cabbage such that there are still exposed holes at the bottom so that steam can enter the basket. Place dumplings on the cabbage without them touching one another.Wet the steaming cloth and wring lightly. Drape the cloth over the dumplings to prevent condensed steam from dripping onto the dumplings. Cover with lid then fold in the 4 corners of the cloth over the lid.Steam on high heat until the dumplings are cooked, about 10 minutes. Steam in batches. Serve with black vinegar and finely shredded ginger or chilli sauce.

steps.step: Process half of the prawns in a food blender for a few seconds to get finely minced prawn meat. For the remaining half of the prawns, chop them up roughly using a knife.In a bowl, add minced prawns, minced meat, water chestnuts, garlic, spring onions and the marinade ingredients at (A).
Mix well to form a paste.
Place a piece of dumpling skin on the palm of your hand. Scoop 1/2 tbsp of dumpling filling onto the centre of the skin.

Add a few pieces of chopped prawns. Dab your finger in water and wet the edges of the skin with your moist finger.Fold the dumpling in half to form a half-crescent shape. Starting from one end and with slightly moist fingers, pleat the edges towards the centre. Repeat with the other end. Wrap dumplings until you finish all the filling.Arrange cabbage such that there are still exposed holes at the bottom so that steam can enter the basket.

Place dumplings on the cabbage without them touching one another.Wet the steaming cloth and wring lightly. Drape the cloth over the dumplings to prevent condensed steam from dripping onto the dumplings. Cover with lid then fold in the 4 corners of the cloth over the lid.Steam on high heat until the dumplings are cooked, about 10 minutes. Steam in batches.
Serve with black vinegar and finely shredded ginger or chilli sauce.
